radiographic_examinations.findings: Amorphous hypodensity in the left frontal lobe with associated mild local mass effect.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the head
radiographic_examinations.findings: Focal hyperintensity in the left frontal lobe, corresponding to a ring-enhancing lesion surrounded by edema.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Solid, noncalcified nodule in the right upper lung measuring 2.2 cm in diameter.
Low lung volumes, new diffuse interstitial opacities, and bilateral hilar fullness.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Findings were new relative to the baseline staging studies obtained 3 months earlier.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse ground-glass opacities, interlobular septal thickening, and mild traction bronchiectasis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Findings were new relative to the baseline staging studies obtained 3 months earlier.
